text: Sinezona garciai is a species of minute sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk or micromollusk in the family Scissurellidae, the little slit shells. ==Description== ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Caribbean Sea. ==References== * Geiger D.L. (2012) Monograph of the little slit shells. Volume 1. Introduction, Scissurellidae. pp. 1–728. Volume 2. Anatomidae, Larocheidae, Depressizonidae, Sutilizonidae, Temnocinclidae. pp. 729–1291. Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History Monographs Number 7 Category:Scissurellidae Category:Gastropods described in 2006
title: Sinezona garciai
